MediaRecorderIsTypeSupported.summary: The isTypeSupported() static method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Boolean")}} which is true if the MIME media type specified is one the user agent should be able to successfully record.

remarks.para:
-MediaStream Recording API
-Using the MediaStream Recording API
-Guide to media types and formats on the web
-Codecs in common media types
-
-
-

MediaRecorderIsTypeSupported.returns:
A , true if the implementation is capable of recording objects for the specified MIME type.
Recording may still fail if there are insufficient resources to support the recording and encoding process.
If the value is false, the user agent is incapable of recording the specified format.
